mapper.select: select std_id, adr_lms, cls_lms, name, photo, day, sdt, edt, rcrtm_state, goal, cont, prsn, rate from sms_std where std_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into sms_std( name, adr_lms, cls_lms, goal, photo, day, sdt, edt, cont, prsn, rate) values( #{name}, #{address}, #{cls}, #{goal}, #{photo}, #{day}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{contents}, #{personnel}, 0)
mapper.update: update sms_std set name = #{name}, adr_lms = #{address}, cls_lms = #{cls}, goal = #{goal}, photo = #{photo}, day = #{day}, sdt = #{startDate}, edt = #{endDate}, cont = #{contents}, prsn = #{personnel}, rate = #{rate} where std_id = #{no}
